attributes.action: Make it law that UK citizens can vote who is allowed to live or work in the UK
attributes.additional_details: English people have a right to their own sovereignty and culture in their country and mass immigration both legal and illegal, has had a devastating effect on individuals, towns and cities, changing England and English culture in to a society and country which has become divided, and often unrecognisable.
attributes.background: UK public must have a voice on who they live alongside with. Government must allow UK to vote before anyone is allowed to live or work in UK. The UK public must have open and transparent consultation and a vote

rejection.details: We are not sure whether you would like there to be a referendum on UK immigration policy, or something else. You could start a new petition setting out your request more clearly.
